message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $1050000.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1175000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we agree on $1100000?

I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm fairly compensated for the value this product brings. I'm counteroffering at $1150000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1125000. This feels like a fair compromise given the value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1125000, Bob, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1142500. This is my last concession, so I hope you can meet me here.
Thank you for your patience, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1135000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I'm counteroffering at $1145000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your efforts, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1140000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product and our previous negotiations.
